source_sentence: 「星、翳、燈、幻、　　露、泡、夢、電、　　雲，見如是，
translation: “So it is with the stars, lightning, lamps, illusions, dew, bubbles, dreams, lightning, and clouds.
This is the conditioned one.

source_sentence: 此語，世尊，歡喜上座善實，彼及比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，彼天、人、阿脩羅、乾闥婆等，
translation: These words, Bhagavān, are rejoicing to the good reality of the superior monk, and those monks, bhikṣuṇīs, laymen, laymen, laymen, humans, asuras, gandharvas, and so forth.
Having heard the World-honored One’s exhortation, they were overjoyed.
I take refuge in all the buddhas, bodhisattvas, and so forth!
